title: The Little Hero: Children Brave Story with Illustration
description: When a little boy named Mays wakes up one night and discovers his house is on fire, he knows he has to do something. With the help of the police, firefighters, and his family, Mays will discover that even he has what it takes to be a hero. This is children illustration book with brave story. An inspiring tale of one boy who learns just how important he really is.
author: Ronald Destra
